verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph אֵ֤ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> The mighty אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֡ים <S%H430><s%> God יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [even] the LORD דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> and called אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth מִמִּזְרַח־ <S%H4217><s%> from the rising שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to its מְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3996><s%> unto the going down
מִצִּיּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Out of Zion מִכְלַל־ <S%H4359><s%> the perfection יֹ֗פִי <S%H3308><s%> of beauty אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> God הוֹפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3313><s%> hath shined

יָ֤בֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> shall come אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> Our God וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> and not יֶ֫חֱרַ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> and shall not keep silence אֵשׁ־ <S%H784><s%> a fire לְפָנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> before תֹּאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> shall devour וּ֝סְבִיבָ֗יו <S%H5439><s%> round about נִשְׂעֲרָ֥ה <S%H8175><s%> tempestuous מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> him and it shall be very

יִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> He shall call אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> to the heavens מֵעָ֑ל <S%H5920><s%> from above וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and to the earth לָדִ֥ין <S%H1777><s%> that he may judge עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

אִסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> Gather לִ֥י חֲסִידָ֑י <S%H2623><s%> my saints כֹּרְתֵ֖י <S%H3772><s%> together unto me those that have made בְרִיתִ֣י <S%H1285><s%> a covenant עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> with זָֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> with me by sacrifice

וַיַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> shall declare שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> And the heavens צִדְק֑וֹ <S%H6664><s%> his righteousness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֱלֹהִ֓ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> for God שֹׁפֵ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> [is] judge ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> himself Selah

שִׁמְעָ֤ה <S%H8085><s%> Hear עַמִּ֨י ׀ <S%H5971><s%> O my people וַאֲדַבֵּ֗רָה <S%H1696><s%> and I will speak יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel וְאָעִ֣ידָה <S%H5749><s%> and I will testify בָּ֑ךְ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> against thee I [am] God אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ <S%H430><s%> [even] thy God אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> I

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for זְ֭בָחֶיךָ <S%H2077><s%> thee for thy sacrifices אוֹכִיחֶ֑ךָ <S%H3198><s%> I will not reprove וְעוֹלֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H5930><s%> or thy burnt offerings לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <S%H5048><s%> before תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> [to have been] continually

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אֶקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> I will take מִבֵּיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> out of thy house פָ֑ר <S%H6499><s%> no bullock מִ֝מִּכְלְאֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H4356><s%> out of thy folds עַתּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H6260><s%> [nor] he goats

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לִ֥י כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every חַיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> For every beast יָ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest בְּ֝הֵמ֗וֹת <S%H929><s%> [is] mine [and] the cattle בְּהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> hills אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> upon a thousand

יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every ע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> all the fowls הָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains וְזִ֥יז <S%H2123><s%> and the wild beasts שָׂ֝דַ֗י <S%H7704><s%> of the field עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> [are] mine

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֶ֭רְעַב <S%H7456><s%> If I were hungry לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֹ֣מַר <S%H559><s%> I would not tell לָ֑ךְ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לִ֥י תֵ֝בֵ֗ל <S%H8398><s%> thee for the world וּמְלֹאָֽהּ׃ <S%H4393><s%> [is] mine and the fulness

הַֽ֭אוֹכַל <S%H398><s%> Will I eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh אַבִּירִ֑ים <S%H47><s%> of bulls וְדַ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood עַתּוּדִ֣ים <S%H6260><s%> of male אֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> or drink

זְבַ֣ח <S%H2076><s%> Offer לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> unto God תּוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> thanksgiving וְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> and pay לְעֶלְי֣וֹן <S%H5945><s%> unto the most High נְדָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5088><s%> thy vows

וּ֭קְרָאֵנִי <S%H7121><s%> And call בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> upon me in the day צָרָ֑ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble אֲ֝חַלֶּצְךָ֗ <S%H2502><s%> I will deliver וּֽתְכַבְּדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3513><s%> thee and thou shalt glorify

וְלָ֤רָשָׁ֨ע ׀ <S%H7563><s%> But unto the wicked אָ֘מַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לְּ֭ךָ לְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> What hast thou to do to declare חֻקָּ֑י <S%H2706><s%> my statutes וַתִּשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> or [that] thou shouldest take בְרִיתִ֣י <S%H1285><s%> my covenant עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> and פִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> according

וְ֭אַתָּה <S%H859><s%> you שָׂנֵ֣אתָ <S%H8130><s%> Seeing thou hatest מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction וַתַּשְׁלֵ֖ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and castest דְּבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> my words אַחֲרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H310><s%> behind

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> When רָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> When thou sawest גַ֭נָּב <S%H1590><s%> a thief וַתִּ֣רֶץ <S%H7521><s%> then thou consentedst עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְעִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with מְנָאֲפִ֣ים <S%H5003><s%> with adulterers חֶלְקֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2506><s%> with him and hast been partaker

פִּ֭יךָ <S%H6310><s%> thy mouth שָׁלַ֣חְתָּ <S%H7971><s%> Thou givest בְרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> to evil וּ֝לְשׁוֹנְךָ֗ <S%H3956><s%> and thy tongue תַּצְמִ֥יד <S%H6775><s%> frameth מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> deceit

תֵּ֭שֵׁב <S%H3427><s%> Thou sittest בְּאָחִ֣יךָ <S%H251><s%> against thy brother תְדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> [and] speakest בְּבֶֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אִ֝מְּךָ֗ <S%H517><s%> thine own mother's תִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> thou דֹּֽפִי׃ <S%H1848><s%> slanderest

אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These עָשִׂ֨יתָ ׀ <S%H6213><s%> These [things] hast thou done וְֽהֶחֱרַ֗שְׁתִּי <S%H2790><s%> and I kept silence דִּמִּ֗יתָ <S%H1819><s%> thou thoughtest הֱֽיוֹת־ <S%H1961><s%> that I was altogether אֶֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> was just כָמ֑וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like אוֹכִיחֲךָ֖ <S%H3198><s%> [such an one] as thyself [but] I will reprove וְאֶֽעֶרְכָ֣ה <S%H6186><s%> thee and set [them] in order לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> before thine eyes

בִּֽינוּ־ <S%H995><s%> Now consider נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Now זֹ֭את <S%H2063><s%> who שֹׁכְחֵ֣י <S%H7911><s%> this ye that forget אֱל֑וֹהַּ <S%H433><s%> God פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or אֶ֝טְרֹ֗ף <S%H2963><s%> lest I tear [you] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <S%H5337><s%> and [there be] none to deliver

זֹבֵ֥חַ <S%H2076><s%> Whoso offereth תּוֹדָ֗ה <S%H8426><s%> praise יְֽכַ֫בְּדָ֥נְנִי <S%H3513><s%> glorifieth וְשָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> me and to him that ordereth דֶּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [his] conversation אַ֝רְאֶ֗נּוּ <S%H7200><s%> [aright] will I shew בְּיֵ֣שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> the salvation אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God
